So said  Michael Silverstein  on  2002-12-17 --------------------

>> From: trobbs2 <trobbs2@...> [mailto:trobbs2@...] 
>
>> > Yes, it does. If my article "JUnit: A Starter Guide" didn't
mention 
>> > that explicitly, then that's a defect in my article.
>> 
>> Where would I find this article?
>> 
>...
>> And is this the FAQ on junit.org?
>> 
>> Sorry for the document location questions if they are 
>> obvious.  I'm replying quickly before a meeting. :)
>
>1) Start computer
>2) Open web browser
>3) Enter www.google.com in url field
>4) Enter "JUnit: A Starter Guide" in web page text field
>5) Click on one of the links
>6) Use scroll bar or mouse wheel to view bottom text

Hey, it works! :)
